Project Objectives: GOVERNMENT PROTECTION OF ASYLUM SEEKERS AND REFUGEES IN KENYA IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE COUNTRY'S INTERNATIONAL OBLIGATIONS.
NG Programme: 060200 - National Government Administration and Field Services
Implementing Agency: 102 - Ministry of Interior and Coordination of National Government

Project Title: Restoration And Stabilization Of Livelihoods For Drought Affected And Host Communities In Turkana And Garissa Districts
Project Description: The project focuses on the worst drought and conflict affected and neglected areas of Northern Rift Valley and North Eastern Provincces of Kenya which host the largest number of refugees. The specific focus districts are Turkana and Garissa Districts.
Project Objectives: Recovery from drought impacct and resilience capacities enhanced at community county national levels especially targeting women and youth groups
Implementing Agency: 103 - Ministry of Devolution and Planning

Project Description: Strategies and support geared towards access, retention quality education with a focus on the girl child among nomadic communities especially in the ASAL areas.
Project Objectives: Increase GER for ECD in ASAL districts. Increase primary education GER in ASAL districts. Increase primary completion rate and transition to secondary school.
Implementing Agency: 103 - Ministry of Devolution and Planning; 106 - Ministry of Education; 1061 - State Department for Education
